inclusion.criterion: Hepatitis C Virus ribonucleic acid (HCV RNA) 1000 IU/mL or greater
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: End stage renal disease on hemodialysis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Females of child bearing potential must be using an adequate method of contraception throughout the study and must have a negative pregnancy test prior to the start of treatment.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Intolerance to peg-IFN or ribavirin with prior treatment course.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Prior treatment with protease inhibitor (telaprevir or boceprevir) or experimental protease inhibitor.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Significant cytopenias: Absolute neutrophil count (ANC) < 1000/mm3, OR Hemoglobin (Hgb) <10.5 g/dL, or Platelet count < 50,000/mm3.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Significant laboratory abnormalities: Direct bilirubin > 1.5 x upper limit of normal (ULN).
exclusion.label: unknown
